reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) CHEM 203 or (b) all of CHEM 233, CHEM 235.
Co-reqs: CHEM 213.
This course is open only to students in Honours, Majors, and Combined Honours specializations in Chemistry and Biochemistry.
You will be moved into active registration IF space becomes available. Timetables MAY BE MODIFIED to allow conflict-free registration. Waitlisting does not guarantee placement in this course. If you are waitlisted, it is recommended that you access the SSC periodically to check your status. It is YOUR responsibility to check the SSC for registration changes.
Lab XMT is NOT available for direct registration by students. CHEM 245 XMT is a special section of this course created to specifically assist in the registration of students into CHEM 245 who have successfully completed an organic laboratory component previously. Such students are not permitted to take CHEM 245. Direct registration into this section is not permitted, and students with the above laboratory experience should contact the Laboratory Director of CHEM 245 for assistance. Students placed into this section of the course will receive an EX (exemption) on their transcript but will NOT receive any credit towards their degree requirements.
description: Techniques in synthetic organic and inorganic chemistry. Open only to students in Chemistry or Biochemistry specializations.
